description: A dashboard that monitors OpenCost and focuses on giving a overview for OpenCost. It is created using the [opencost-mixin](https://github.com/adinhodovic/opencost-mixin).

targets.expr: sum(finops_optimization_savings)

sum(finops_optimization_savings{recommendation_type!="add_cpu_limits",recommendation_type!="add_cpu_limits_and_requests",recommendation_type!="add_memory_limits",recommendation_type!="add_memory_limits_and_requests"}) by (recommendation_type)
finops_efficiency_score{job=~"finops-api"}
finops_anomaly_score{job=~"finops-api"}
sum(kubecost_load_balancer_cost) * 240.167
sum(kubecost_load_balancer_cost)*240.167

targets.legendFormat: Current CPU hourly cost vs. 30-day average
Current RAM hourly cost vs. 30-day average
Current PV hourly cost vs. 30-day average

targets.expr:
topk(10,
  (
    ## CPU + Memria
    sum(
      sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes{job="opencost"}) by (namespace, instance)
      * on(instance) group_left()
        (node_ram_hourly_cost{job="opencost"} / (1024 * 1024 * 1024) * 240.167)
    ) by (namespace)
    +
    sum(
      sum(container_cpu_allocation{job="opencost"}) by (namespace, instance)
      * on(instance) group_left()
        (node_cpu_hourly_cost{job="opencost"} * 240.167)
    ) by (namespace)

    ## Load Balancer
    +
    (
      sum(kubecost_load_balancer_cost{job="opencost"} * 240.167) by (namespace)
      or
      (
        0 * label_replace(
          sum(container_cpu_allocation{job="opencost"}) by (namespace),
          "namespace", "$1", "namespace", "(.*)"
        )
      )
    )

    ## Persistent Volumes
    +
    (
      sum(
        label_replace(
          (
            kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes{job="opencost"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
            * on(persistentvolume)
              group_left()
              (pv_hourly_cost{job="opencost"} * 240.167)
          )
          * on(persistentvolume)
            group_left(claim_namespace)
            kube_persistentvolume_claim_ref
          ,
          "namespace", "$1", "claim_namespace", "(.*)"
        )
      ) by (namespace)
      or
      (
        0 * label_replace(
          sum(container_cpu_allocation{job="opencost"}) by (namespace),
          "namespace", "$1", "namespace", "(.*)"
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
